title: Feminine Reclamation
subtitle: Reclaiming the power you were taught to hide
description: Reconnect with the full spectrum of feminine energyâ€”including the parts that were shamed, suppressed, or made dangerous. This course guides women through reclaiming intuition, desire, anger, and wild wisdom.

modules.title: Understanding Feminine Conditioning
modules.description: What you were taught to suppress and why

modules.title: The Seven Feminine Archetypes
modules.description: Maiden, Mother, Queen, Huntress, Sage, Mystic, Lover

modules.title: Reclaiming Your Anger
modules.description: The rage you weren't allowed to feel

modules.title: Healing Mother Wounds
modules.description: What your mother couldn't give or gave too much

modules.title: Trusting Your Knowing
modules.description: Reconnecting with intuition and body wisdom

whatYouLearn: Identify how feminine conditioning shaped you
Work with the seven feminine archetypes
Reclaim healthy anger and set fierce boundaries
Reconnect with desire and pleasure without guilt
Process mother wounds and their impact
Trust your intuition and body wisdom
requirements: Willingness to examine conditioning around womanhood

questions.question: What is 'feminine conditioning' referring to?
options: Societal messages about how women should be that suppress authentic expression

questions.question: Why is reclaiming anger important in feminine healing?
options: Women's anger was often shamed, leading to suppression or indirect expression

questions.question: What is a common mother wound pattern?
options: They only happen with bad mothers
Inheriting her unlived dreams, competing with her, or becoming her caretaker

questions.question: What does 'reclaiming desire' involve?
options: Knowing and pursuing what you actually want without guilt or apology

questions.question: What is the 'wild feminine'?
options: The untamed, instinctual, creative life force that doesn't conform to expectations

questions.question: How does body wisdom differ from mental analysis?
options: Body wisdom includes felt sense, intuition, and knowing that doesn't come through thinking
Body wisdom is always right, mind is always wrong

questions.question: Why work with feminine archetypes?
options: To access different aspects of feminine energy and understand which are over or underdeveloped
